name: Llama Ullama
description:
The ancient ballgame, full of ritual and importance. Players entered the court with only one goal, survive by knocking the ullama ball into the hoop using their bodies. But these are no ordinary players, these are llamas, ullama llamas.

Red Llama - WASD to move

Blue Llama - Arrows to move

Made in a few hours for Global Game Jam 2016.
